participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and expressive, with a playful attitude towards school.
participant_1.background: Emily is a high school student who enjoys spending time with friends but struggles with the rigid structure of school.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: laid-back and humorous, appreciates a good laugh and values friendship.
participant_2.background: Jake is a sophomore who likes to have fun and often jokes about school, but he is also dedicated to his studies.

content.text: Hi, now its holdiay and i dont have go to school, thats greatt
i love my freinds and lessons, but not schooll
i hate rules and getting up earlyyy
and the most important my dear math teacher
he is the best , he is soo handsome and friendly, but i hate mathhhhh
